Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class MoveStudentMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.MovementMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.MoveStudentMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MoveStudentMessage extends MovementMessage
The class MoveStudentMessage represent the action that move a student in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MoveStudentMessage

      public MoveStudentMessage(String sender, int studentId, Location departureType, int departureId, Location arrivalType, int arrivalId)
      The constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      sender - is the sender of the Message, is a String that contain the nickname of the player
      studentId - is the id of the student to be moved
      departureType - is the type of the departure location
      departureId - is the id of the departure location
      arrivalType - is the type of the arrival location
      arrivalId - is the id of the arrival location

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public Update execute(Game game) throws NoActiveCardException, IllegalMoveException, NoPlayerException, NoIslandException
      The method execute is an override of the class Message, apply all the changes needed to the model through the game to move a student in the game
      Specified by:
      execute in class Message
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      Returns:
      an Update object to communicate the state of the game to the controller
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - is the exception thrown if there is no character card active
      IllegalMoveException - is the exception thrown if MoveStudent is not a permitted action
      NoPlayerException - is the exception thrown if a player isn't found
      NoIslandException - is the exception thrown if an island isn't found

      This method return the id of the student
